enhanced_description: 99jobs is an HRTech platform dedicated to transforming the job market by helping individuals pursue their passions. It offers creative and inclusive solutions for Recruitment and Selection processes, focusing on technology, creativity, and inclusion to promote an inclusive culture and ensure a match of values. The platform includes a search portal for candidates, bringing together thousands of open positions across various sectors and segments throughout Brazil. For companies, 99jobs provides an ATS (Application Tracking System) for streamlined recruitment and selection management, centralized data management, and generating valuable metrics for recruitment efforts. Additionally, it offers HR Nativeland Consulting for recruitment and Employer Branding, alongside training and development programs focused on Social Reparation and Inclusive Culture.
